Up.Statement:
-- メールテンプレートの削除 購入履歴注文者情報変更メール（00000148）、購入履歴注文者情報変更メール【管理者向け】（00000149） IF EXISTS (SELECT mail_id FROM [w2_MailTemplate] WHERE shop_id = '0' AND mail_id = N'00000148')BEGIN DELETE FROM [w2_MailTemplate] WHERE mail_id = N'00000148' END
IF EXISTS (SELECT mail_id FROM [w2_MailTemplate] WHERE shop_id = '0' AND mail_id = N'00000149')BEGIN DELETE FROM [w2_MailTemplate] WHERE mail_id = N'00000149' END
